entry.subtitle: Built by the Vue Community, Backed by Sponsors.

sponsors.title: Sponsors & Backers
sponsors.description: Vuetify is proudly supported by these amazing companies and individuals. If you'd like to join them, please consider sponsoring Vuetify's development.

ecosystem.title: More than just Components
ecosystem.subtitle: A complete Vue ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Vuetify is a complete Vue ecosystem that provides you with all of the tools necessary to create beautiful content rich web applications.

one.title: Vuetify One
one.subtitle: Everything in One Place
one.description: A unified platform providing powerful all Ecosystem Tools in one place. Build faster, collaborate better, and create stunning Vuetify applications.

tools.play: An interactive playground to experiment with Vuetify components and features in real-time.
tools.bin: A code sharing platform tailored for Vuetify projects, enabling easy collaboration and sharing of code snippets.
tools.studio: A visual development environment for building Vuetify applications with drag-and-drop components and real-time previews.
tools.link: A URL shortening service designed for Vuetify developers to create and manage short links efficiently.
tools.mcp: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server providing Vuetify component information and documentation.
tools.issues: Easily report issues and request features for projects in the Vuetify Ecosystem.

tooling.title: Vuetify Tooling
tooling.subtitle: Tools & Resources
tooling.description: Vuetify provides a suite of tools for managing your Vuetify projects.

create.title: Vuetify Create
create.description: Scaffold your next Vuetify application with just a few commands.

cli.title: Vuetify CLI
cli.description: Command-line interface for managing Vuetify projects.

uikit.title: Vuetify UI Kit
uikit.description: Figma UI Kit based on Material Design for creating custom components.

eslint-config.title: Vuetify ESLint Config
eslint-config.description: Opinionated ESLint config to keep your code clean and consistent.

eslint-plugin.title: Vuetify ESLint Plugin
eslint-plugin.description: Automated version upgrade plugin for seamless migrations.

loader.title: Vuetify Loader
loader.description: Vite and Webpack loader for automatic component imports.

snips.subtitle: Premium Examples
snips.description: Vuetify Snips is a collection of over 560 beautifully crafted UI snippets, built with Vuetify, aimed at making your development process easier and faster.

store.title: Vuetify Store
store.subtitle: Premium Templates & Themes
store.description: Browse our collection of premium templates, themes and UI kits. All themes are built with Vuetify and are available for everyone.

support.title: Need support with your Vuetify project?
support.subtitle: Vuetify Support Services
support.description: We've got you covered. We offer a range of support options to help you get the most out of Vuetify.

developer.title: Single Developer Support
developer.subtitle: Get professional support from the experts behind Vuetify.

consulting.title: Consulting Services
consulting.subtitle: Epicmax provides consulting services for your project.

lts.title: Extended LTS support
lts.subtitle: HeroDevs provides extended long-term support for Vuetify 2 users.

discord.title: Join our community of 40k+ developers
discord.description: Join us to get help with your Vuetify projects, share your work, and connect with other developers on Discord.

blogs.title: Vuetify Blog
blogs.subtitle: Latest news and updates
blogs.description: Stay up to date with the latest news and updates from the Vuetify team.

gallery.title: Component Gallery
gallery.description: Vuetify provides a comprehensive collection of components that can be used to build your application.

dark-code-message: Change all code blocks to use a dark theme.

comparison.average: **Based on average of all Major/Minor/Patch releases over the last 12 months.
comparison.caption: Vue Framework Comparison {year}

communication-message: Vuetify will communicate with you through banners and notifications. You can disable these features here or reset your local notification cache.

advanced-options.danger-zone-message: The following settings are for development purposes.

perks.alert: Support Vuetify and gain access to exclusive documentation perks and features for only
perks.avatar-message: Add a custom avatar image displayed on the user profile and user bar.
perks.disable-ads-message: Disable advertisements on all documentation pages.
perks.experience-message: These options change your browsing experience within the documentation.
perks.layout-message: Modify various the visibility and behavior of various elements of the documentation.
perks.rail-drawer-message: Show the navigation drawer as a rail that expands on hover
perks.disable-quickbar-message: Hide the Quickbar actions located on the top right of the documentation
perks.enable-pins-message: Bookmark and access vital documentation pages for a more efficient workflow.

developer-mode-message: Developer mode enables new features and functionality within the documentation that are still in development.
display-message: Toggle various elements of the documentation experience.
enable-banners-message: Banners are located at the top of the screen and usually provide general information about Vuetify.
enable-composition-message: Determines the script shown in code examples for components.
enable-inline-api-message: Display API tables inline on documentation pages.
enable-notifications-message: Notifications are located at the top right of the screen in the actions bar and provide information about new releases, updates, and other important information.
enable-pwa-refresh-message: Display the refresh prompt when new documentation updates have been downloaded.

epicmax.title: Need support with your Vuetify project?
epicmax.message: Epicmax is here to support you - whether it's migrating to Vue3, adjusting your Vue.js code, or building custom front-ends.

login.tagline: Sign in with GitHub or Discord to save your settings and unlock exclusive subscriber perks.

name: Name
ready-text: Continue your learning with related content selected by the {team} or move between pages by using the navigation links below.

search.label: Search
search.results: Your search results will appear here

offline.message: Install a service worker to cache the entire site locally.
offline.active-message: Disable this option to remove the service worker and clear the cache.
offline.offline-message: You are currently offline, the site is served from cache.
offline.pending: There is a pending update, reload the page to activate.

slash-search-message: This option sets the bound search key to '/' from Cmd/Ctrl+K.
sync-settings-message: When logged in w/ GitHub, sync settings across devices.
theme-message: Customize your documentation experience with light and dark themes, as well as a combination of both named.
